Please help to protect the #environment straight after your dinner by following these simple steps‚Ä¶

@thameswater & @EnvAgency investing üòègood luck with that ü§•all within the permitted limits & is okay as it will be diluted by the rainfall @JamesBevanEA ‚ÄúOur rivers are better now than anytime since the Industrial Revolution ‚Äú Blah Blah Blah https://t.co/moVrUB6WMY

Our 3rd #CPYorks session is a-go! We‚Äôre looking at tips for organising training as a #flood Warden- why not invite guest speakers from Cat 1 & 2 agencies to help keep it engaging? What do you do to keep your training interesting? Let us know! @SimonHildonEA @EnvAgencyYNE

urls.title: Programme | Flood & Coast
urls.description: Telford International Centre, UK After considerable discussion and research, we have taken the decision to transform our 2020 event from a face to face event into a series of four digital sessions tackling some of the major challenges of our time. The sessions will run from October 2020, up to our in-person event in Telford confirmed for 29 th June ‚Äì 1 st July 2021. Additionally, we will host a digital ceremony for the Flood & Coast Excellence Awards 2020 on December 9th. Headline sponsor: The way we

text: Are you joining us at #FloodandCoast2020 ? With the @EnvAgency's new #FCERM strategy recently passing parliament, now is a great time to register for Session 1: Creating Climate Resilient Places on 13 October and join in the discussion live online! https://t.co/ZREo8l5zmU https://t.co/XL47huZTJ5
